name: adoptee

someone who has been adopted as a child (= legally taken into another family and cared for as the family's own child): Her family included two adoptees, aged 3 and 2. Support groups welcome birth parents, adoptees, and adoptive parents to share their experiences.
More examplesFewer examplesThey met at a reunion of Vietnamese-born adoptees, organized by the Vietnamese Adoptee Network. New Jersey state law prevents adoptees from gaining access to their birth records."It's important to meet people who've had the same experiences you've had", said adoptee Chris Brown.The agency serves as an intermediary between willing adult adoptees and birth parents.
